description:
A fishing hook is lost, then found.  A man does not understand the proper etiquette for eating crab.  A blue oni and a red oni fight for the love of a goddess.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umisachihiko and Yamasachihiko / The Stupid Groom and the Crab Loincloth / The Demons Who Passed Through Demon Pass
Umisachihiko to Yamasachihiko / Oroka Muko to Kani no Fundoshi / Onigoe o Kayotta Oni-tachi
海幸彦と山幸彦 / 愚か婿と蟹のふんどし / 鬼越を通った鬼たち
